products.title: Quinoa and Nuts Bowl
products.description: Quinoa, mixed greens, apples, roasted pumpkin, beetroot and carrots. Tossed in a dijon, balsamic dressing and topped with roasted almonds, seeds and feta.

products.title: Quinoa and Nuts Bowl (with Egg*)
products.description:
Quinoa, mixed greens, apples, roasted pumpkin, beetroot and carrots. Tossed in a dijon, balsamic dressing and topped with roasted almonds, seeds and feta and a soft boiled egg* on the side.
*We use free range eggs (Keggs).

products.title: Quinoa and Nuts Bowl (with Chicken)
products.description: Quinoa and balsamic chicken, mixed greens, apples, roasted pumpkin, beetroot and carrots. Tossed in a dijon, balsamic dressing and topped with roasted almonds, seeds and feta.

products.title: Orange Barley Bowl (Tofu)
products.description: Barley, greens, vegetables (broccoli, baby corn, beans and carrots), and the odd nugget of fresh orange. All mixed in an orange mustard ginger dressing. Topped with toasted flax seeds.

products.title: Orange Barley Bowl (Chicken)
products.description: Barley, roasted chicken, greens, vegetables (broccoli, baby corn, beans and carrots), and the odd nugget of fresh orange. All mixed in an orange mustard ginger dressing. Topped with toasted flax seeds.

products.title: Thai Browl Rice Bowl (Paneer)
products.description: Thai grilled paneer with salad vegetables and greens served with basil brown rice. The peanut-butter + coconut milk dressing, along with crunchy roasted groundnuts, bring the Thai flavors home.

products.title: Thai Brown Rice Bowl (Chicken)
products.description: Thai grilled chicken with salad vegetables and greens served with basil brown rice. The peanut-butter + coconut milk dressing, along with crunchy roasted groundnuts, bring the Thai flavors home.

products.title: Rice Noodle Shrimp Bowl
products.description: Sweet and chilly shrimps with rice noodles and assorted vegetables. An equally flavourful dressing and surprise chunks of fruit give this bowl a very tropical vibe, topped off with some roasted cashews.
